00006 void TDCMeasurement::SetTrailer(uint32_t trailer){  
00007   tdc_trailer_word = trailer;

00011 /// Get the TDC number
00012 uint32_t TDCMeasurement::GetTDCNumber() const {
00013   if(HasTDCHeader())
00014     return ((tdc_header_word & 0x3000000) >> 24 );
00015   if(HasTDCTrailer())
00016     return ((tdc_trailer_word & 0x3000000) >> 24 );
00017   return 0xdeadbeef;  
00018 }
00019 
00020 /// Get Event ID
00021 uint32_t TDCMeasurement::GetEventID() const {
00022   if(HasTDCHeader())
00023     return ((tdc_header_word & 0xfff000) >> 12 );
00024   if(HasTDCTrailer())
00025     return ((tdc_trailer_word & 0xfff000) >> 12 );
00026   return 0xdeadbeef;
00027 }
00028 
00029 /// Get Bunch ID
00030 uint32_t TDCMeasurement::GetBunchID() const {
00031   if(HasTDCHeader())
00032     return ((tdc_header_word & 0xfff));
00033   return 0xdeadbeef;  
00034 }
00035 
00036   /// Get Errors
00037 uint32_t TDCMeasurement::GetErrors() const{
00038   if(HasTDCErrorWord())
00039     return ((tdc_error_error & 0x7fff));
00040   return 0xdeadbeef;  
00041

00043 }

00045 
00046 TV1190Data::TV1190Data(int bklen, int bktype, const char* name, void *pdata):
00047     TGenericData(bklen, bktype, name, pdata)
00048 {
00049   
00050   // Do some sanity checking.  
00051   // Make sure first word has right identifier
00052   if( (GetData32()[0] & 0xf8000000) != 0x40000000) 
00053     std::cerr << "First word has wrong identifier; first word = 0x" 
00054               << std::hex << GetData32()[0] << std::dec << std::endl;
00055   fGlobalHeader = GetData32()[0];
00056 
00057 
00058   // Scan through the data, saving information as we go.
00059   int found_trailer_word = -1;
00060   fExtendedTriggerTimeTag = -1;
00061 
00062   uint32_t current_tdc_header =0;
00063   int index_for_trailer = 0;
00064   int index_for_error = 0;
00065   for(int i = 0; i < GetSize(); i++){
00066     uint32_t word = GetData32()[i];
00067 
00068     // TDC header
00069     if( (word & 0xf8000000) == 0x08000000){
00070       current_tdc_header = word;
00071     }
00072     // TDC measurement
00073     if( (word & 0xf8000000) == 0x00000000){
00074       fMeasurements.push_back(TDCMeasurement(current_tdc_header,word));
00075     }
00076     
00077     // TDC trailer
00078     if( (word & 0xf8000000) == 0x18000000){
00079       // Set the TDC trailer word for all the measurements since the last
00080       // TDC trailer.
00081       for(unsigned int i = index_for_trailer; i < fMeasurements.size(); i++){
00082         fMeasurements[i].SetTrailer(word);
00083       }
00084       index_for_trailer = fMeasurements.size();      
00085     }
00086 
00087     // TDC error
00088     if( (word & 0xf8000000) == 0x20000000){
00089       // Set the TDC error word for all the measurements since the last
00090       // TDC error.
00091       std::cout << "Error word: " << std::hex << "0x"<<word<< std::dec << std::endl;
00092       for(unsigned int i = index_for_trailer; i < fMeasurements.size(); i++){
00093         fMeasurements[i].SetErrors(word);
00094       }
00095       index_for_error = fMeasurements.size();    
00096     }
00097 
00098 
00099     // Extended Trigger Time Tag
00100     if( (word & 0xf8000000) == 0x88000000) fExtendedTriggerTimeTag = (word & 0x07ffffff);
00101 
00102     // Found global trailer
00103     if( (word & 0xf8000000) == 0x80000000){ // Found trailer
00104       found_trailer_word = i;
00105       fWordCount = (word & 0x0001fffe0) >> 5;
00106       if(fWordCount != GetSize())
00107         std::cerr << "Error in decoding V1190 data; word count in trailer ("<<fWordCount 
00108                   << ") doesn't match bank size ("<< GetSize() << ")." << std::endl;
00109       fStatus = (word & 0x07000000) >> 24;
00110     }
00111  
00112   }
00113   
00114   if(found_trailer_word == -1)
00115     std::cerr << "Error in decoding V1190 data; didn't find trailer." << std::endl;
00116   if(found_trailer_word != GetSize()-1)
00117     std::cerr << "Error; did not find trailer on last word of bank. trailer word = " << found_trailer_word
00118               << " last word = " << GetSize()-1 << std::endl;
00119 
00120 }

00122 void TV1190Data::Print(){
00123 
00124   std::cout << "V1190 decoder for bank " << GetName().c_str() << std::endl;
00125   std::cout << "event counter = " << GetEventCounter() << ", geographic address: " <<  GetGeoAddress() << std::endl;
00126   
00127   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < fMeasurements.size(); i++){
00128     std::cout << "Measurement: " <<    fMeasurements[i].GetMeasurement() << " for tdc/chan "  <<
00129       fMeasurements[i].GetTDCNumber() << "/"<< fMeasurements[i].GetChannel();
00130     if(fMeasurements[i].IsLeading())
00131       std::cout << " (leading edge meas)";
00132     if(fMeasurements[i].IsTrailing())
00133       std::cout << " (trailing edge meas)";
00134 
00135     std::cout << "[event_id = " << fMeasurements[i].GetEventID() << ",bunch_id=" 
00136               << fMeasurements[i].GetBunchID()<< "]";
00137     if(fMeasurements[i].HasTDCErrorWord())
00138       std::cout << "[errors=0x"<< std::hex << fMeasurements[i].GetErrors() << std::dec << "]";
00139     std::cout << std::endl;
00140   }
